sentences.en: Celebrates the life of the late conservationist and inspirational writer Roger Deakin.
sentences.cn: 庆祝生命的末期保育和带有灵感的作家.

sentences.en: Conservationist tenant preferred, but extractive forestry also considered.
sentences.cn: 保育人士优先考虑, 但采掘业也会考虑.

sentences.en: Conservationist tenant preferred, but extractive forestry also considered. Please apply to the Cameroonian minister of forestry.
sentences.cn: 保育人士优先考虑, 但采掘业也会考虑.良机不再,有意者请速向喀麦隆林业部申请.

sentences.en: Conservationists say the law must be strengthened.
sentences.cn: 环保主义者称必须加强法制。

sentences.en: Harrison Ford. Actor . Conservationist . And friend of frogs.
sentences.cn: 哈里森?福特, 演员,保护主义者和青蛙之友.

trans.tran_cn: 自然资源保护者，生态环境保护者
trans.tran_en: someone who works to protect animals, plants etc or to protect old buildings
